question_text: A user complains that audio occasionally stops working on their HDMI-connected monitor. What is the MOST likely cause if the issue occurs only after the system wakes from sleep?
answer_options: The OS fails to remap the default audio device
The monitor resolution resets to low
correct_answer: The OS fails to remap the default audio device
explanation: Windows may not re-select HDMI audio after sleep or hibernation. This results in the system output defaulting to internal speakers or no output at all.
